name: Critical Roll
description:
Critical Roll is a 3D Platformer, where you play through a masterful campaign made by you, Doug SpellSpeaker, a Level 1 Hamster Wizard who must traverse the lands defeating enemies along his quest, in order to retrieve the Legendary Lettuce of Myth! Journey across the land while rolling around in different dice, rolling for combat to defeat your enemies, and upgrading your dice.

Controls

Keyboard -
> WASD to move
> E to Roll (only available inside Roll Areas)
> Mouse to move camera
> Tab to reset

Controller -
> Left stick to move
> X (Xbox) / Square (PS4) to roll (only available inside Roll Areas)
> Right stick to move camera

Credits

Artists - Andy Vu, Kane Grad
Level Designer - Travis Fichtner
Programmer - James Hicks
Sound Designer - Jason Charbonneau-Fairhart

Known Issues:

After defeating the skeleton and acquiring the D8, there's a gap that's a bit too small for the player to make it through easily.  You CAN make it through, just gotta maneuver a bit.
